descriptionHtml:
-------------------------------------------
XTREM GOLD COIN RETEXTURATION
-------------------------------------------

CHECK MY OTHER MODS :

HD Ore And Ingots : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9912

Creative Ore And Ingots : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7529

----------------
DESCRIPTION
----------------

This mod is a gold coin texture replacer.

(resolution : 1024 x 2048)

Feedback is always welcome, endorse if you like it !

Let me know if you have some request or if you find any issue with this mod.

-----------------
INSTALLATION
-----------------

MANUAL INSTALLATION :


1 - Unzip to a temporary location.

2 - Choose a color.

3 - Copy the \"Data\" folder to your Skyrim directory and overwrite if necessary.


-------------
UNINSTALL
-------------

Just remove all the files listed below from your data/textures/clutter folder :

- coin01_n.dds
- coin01.dds

-----------------
REQUIREMENT
-----------------

The Elder Scroll V : SKYRIM

---------------------
INCOMPATIBILITY
---------------------

NONE
author: BioProd
